summary: Page 3 captures sections vav through yod-bet correctly with appropriate source references. The continuation fragment from section heh is present. Section numbering is sequential and correct. Minor meta page_side error.

issues.description: Page side is marked as 'left' but page כג (23) is odd-numbered, which in Hebrew books is typically the right page.
OCR reads 'כ"א שכר מצוה מצוה' - looking at the image, it appears to read 'כ"א שכר מצוה מצוה' which matches. The overall meaning is correct.
